ValidationRule.description: Requires Services Hours to be entered if the product is Services (but not services credits or collaborative integration development products).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Product__r.Product_Type__c, "Services"), ISBLANK(Services_Hours__c), SBQQ__ProductCode__c <> "IB-00012", SBQQ__ProductCode__c <> "IB-00013", SBQQ__ProductCode__c <> "IB-00014", SBQQ__ProductCode__c <> "IB-00331", SBQQ__ProductCode__c <> "IB-00332", SBQQ__ProductCode__c <> "GE-01566", SBQQ__ProductCode__c <> "GE-01564", SBQQ__ProductCode__c <> "GE-01562", SBQQ__ProductCode__c <> "GE-01565", SBQQ__ProductCode__c <> "GE-01563", SBQQ__ProductCode__c <> "GE-01561", SBQQ__ProductCode__c <> "BU-01619" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter Services Hours for Services Products.
